author: Warhammer
description:
At last, back to war! Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV officially revealed during Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025!

Battle for planet Kronus as Warhammer 40,000's ultimate real time strategy game returns, featuring the largest campaign ever with four distinct factions battling it out in epic, brutal large-scale conflicts. 

Dawn of War IV returns to the legendary RTS series’ roots with satisfying gameplay and a brutal, expanded Sync Kill system. Take command of four Warhammer 40,000 factions, including, for the first time in the Dawn of War series, the Adeptus Mechanicus! Fight through 70+ campaign missions solo or with a friend in a story crafted by legendary Black Library author John French. Immerse yourself in endlessly replayable modes including Last Stand and Skirmish, or take the fight to the world with intense multiplayer combat.

Read more on Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/l8pdgqps/warhammer-40000-dawn-of-war-iv/

Wishlist NOW on Steam
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV Official Announce Trailer | Gamescom Opening Night 2025

author: Warhammer
description:
We have a triple whammy today as Dan shows you how to paint plasma effects on the plasma bombards wielded by the mighty Saturnine Terminators – but you don’t have to stop there. These tips will work for all of your plasma weapons, letting you overcharge your painting skills.

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Frostheart

Layer:
Baharroth Blue 
Sotek Green
Temple Guard Blue
White Scar

Technical:
Lahmian Medium

Tools:
S Drybrush STC
S Layer Brush STC
M Base Brush STC

If you're new to painting, our Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

title: 3 Ways to Paint PLASMA Effects | Warhammer: The Horus Heresy
